description:
Sometimes the worst part about work is actually getting there, especially on Mondays. Running out the door only to find yourself stuck in traffic is a sad reality for a lot of us. That's why we've put together this uplifting playlist to get you through the inevitable Monday grind. Start your day off right with these 20 songs, and we promise you won't even think about hitting snooze.有时候工作中最坏的部分莫过于堵在路上，尤其是周一。跑出门却发现自己被悲催的堵在路上。这也是为什么我们会找一些振奋精神的歌曲让我们度过不可避免的黑色星期一。下面有10首歌曲，让我们用它们开始新的一天，保证你不会想打盹的哦~

1， "Won't Get Lost," The Aston Shuffle

The Aston Shuffle are a house music duo from Canberra, Australia. They are made up of Disc jockey and electronic music producers Mikah Freeman and Vance Musgrove. As well as their DJ gigs and recordings career, they also host their own show on the ABC's Triple J on Friday nights called Friday Night Shuffle.The Aston Shuffle是来自澳大利亚堪培拉的浩室音乐二人组，由唱片骑师和电子音乐制作人米坎姆•弗里曼和万斯组成。他们不仅有DJ演出和唱片事业，周五晚上在ABC还有一个由他们主持的节目。

点击查看第二页
